website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy and spacious, this desk is a great place to spread out work but does not provide the shelving that some of the other models do.
pros: Earns our praise for its attractive design and sturdy construction
cons: Must go in a corner because of its unfinished back

customer_reviews.title: scuff on the top (was easy to fix with some sanding and filler but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Few minor flaws -- the keyboard tray is slightly loose and squeaky, the hinged door is a bit delicate to come undone and there was a small, but deep, scuff on the top (was easy to fix with some sanding and filler but it looks a bit odd). Another nitpick is that mine came with an extremely strong smell of freshly-cut lumber that's not necessarily a bad thing but gets old as it's taken a couple weeks to dissipate. Other than that, a really sturdy, excellent desk for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This desk is STURDY, and HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what I would have done without this desk in my life. This desk is STURDY, and HUGE, and tons of working area, so great. Also it's originally from wayfair, so check the price there before you buy it on Amazon. Updated review: I have since opted not to use the top part that raises the monitor, because i got a triple monitor under-desk pipe mount (akin to wall mounting them) and this is still the best desk ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Best Corner Desk Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely suggest this desk! It is large but space saving all at the same time! Tall enough for most storage cabinets to be put under the right side if you need more storage. Hardy and has a simple beauty. Trust me, I searched around in stores and online and you won't find a better corner desk for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ana May

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, even after hours of screaming.
customer_reviews.text: The desk is awesome, and it's gigantic for anyone who hasn't read it's dimensions. With my father and I working on it, it still took a few hours to put it together. Instructions are a bit meh, but most instructions are. Pros: Great looking desk. One of the best ones I could even find. Tons of space, I run multi-monitors and I still have space to decorate. Feeling of accomplishment that you were able to put it together. Cons: The thin line of your family going into an all out brawl trying to put it together. Overall, it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great desk. Fit and finish are pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk. Fit and finish are pretty good. My only complaint is that the surfaces of the desk facing outward are not finished. I'm sure this is designed to be corner desk only, which explains the lack of finish on the outside. I'm using this as an L-shaped desk with the monitor stand facing into the room, so I'm a bit disappointed in this. However, most inexpensive desks designed to face a wall are setup the same way with finish applied only where it *needs* to be.
customer_reviews.author: EricR

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, not as difficult as reviews can claim.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and stable desk. Directions are straightforward. To address some other reviews about parts not being labeled. If you do not find the sticker, it is written somewhere in marker on the side where the piece is unfinished it is not simply mislabeled. Also those who've said it takes them 3-6 hours to build. By myself with a screwdriver and hammer, no electric tools it took 1 hour and 20 minutes. Overall an amazing desk though.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Had this desk for about a year now.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good desk and big enough to solve my problems. The one issue I have is that the middle pannel is pealing and has cut me a few times. I ordered a replacement once and I've now decided to solve the problem myself. Aside from that one thing I feel like this is literally the best desk I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: M_Leon246

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and she loves it. I might get one for my office as well. It fits nicely and is of good quality. A couple of dings on the unfinished side but doesn't affect build. It took two hours to put together and luckily had pictures. All that matters is my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: James Moss

customer_reviews.title: Best work desk for my home office
customer_reviews.text: Best office desk I've purchased. The instructions booklet was missing from the box but a quick google search solved that. It took my about 2 hours to assemble it by myself. I highly suggest laying all the parts and pieces down first in order to save yourself time and fustration.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Amaral

customer_reviews.title: goes together pretty easy if you have any knowledge of tools and ...
customer_reviews.text: This desk is well built, goes together pretty easy if you have any knowledge of tools and putting things together. Instructions leave a little to be desired, but all in all, is nice. Be VERY careful unboxing it though, because it is very easy to ding the sides. Overall, great desk. Only issue at all, there is no info on website on size of computer storage cabinet. a custom computer case will not fit if you put the back on it. (Mine is a midsize tower) A big tower would not fit in it. Just an FYI for gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M.

customer_reviews.title: desk
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of the desk. 2 pieces were damaged, but the company sent a quick response. The top of the desk is fabulous, it is what holds it up that is the problem. I guess the desk would be to heavy if it was made with the same material the top is made with! Or do you have a choice, and if I do, how much would that cost? Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jaynee

customer_reviews.title: Great Value...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this desk is amazing. It was relatively easy to assemble, though it took me about three hours to complete. It's surprisingly sturdy and can even hold my 200lb-weight kneeling on it. The cabinet is nice to store your CPU without it being visible (back of cabinet has option to leave open to allow air circulation).
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Loved the desk
customer_reviews.text: Loved the desk! My only little disappointment was the if you do not want the desk totally in a corner the outside edges are not finished. It is just the raw compressed wood. Otherwise, we live how spacious and solid the desk is. It has a vet modern look and lots of room underneith for a shedder or something else. Great purchase! The delivery guy was so nice. He helped bring it into the garage. The box is heavy as heck! ;)
customer_reviews.author: evelisis valentin

customer_reviews.title: Honestly the photos look really nice but i had parts missing and the unit itself ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the photos look really nice but i had parts missing and the unit itself is a little flimsy. I would recommend spending a little more and getting a more solid desk. My previous desk from ikea seemed more sturdy than this
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk. A beast to put together alone so make sure you have help. If you have a silver metal desktop computer it goes great. Lots of space also,
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: heavy and sturdy. Build it where you are going to place ...
customer_reviews.text: This desk is huge, heavy and sturdy. Build it where you are going to place it. It has to be against a corner it is not finished on the back.
customer_reviews.author: John Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Good work space, LOTS of assembly
customer_reviews.text: The end product desk is great. Perfect work space. The rub is that it took a very qualified office move team 3 hours to put it together. If you want a quick work space and you're not great with 18 pages of directions and a drill, you should skip this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa de la Garza

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful size and construction
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful size and construction. I'm very very pleased with this desk. The raised center platform is perfect for my monitor. Would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful desk!
customer_reviews.text: This corner desk is so great! It has plenty of spaces that I can fit both my laptops, an external monitor, a printer, plus several other small pieces on without looking crowded. I like the keyboard stand the best since it is on the corner part instead of on either side - make it very easy to use since the only time I'd like to use external keyboard is when I connect to my external monitor, which is on the corner piece also. A little hard to assemble and very hard to move around. Definitely agree with other reviews that you want to assemble it right at where you want to put it.
customer_reviews.author: T_Tony_T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great desk for space and company very good to work with on warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Min Min

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son, who loves it! Good size and sturdy. Easy to assemble - would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: momster50

customer_reviews.title: BIG
customer_reviews.text: this desk is huge and solid and I like both those things. No worries that it will break if I lean on it, and plenty of space. It took the better part of a day and two people to assemble it though. I recommend assembling it where you want it and don't plan on moving it afterward. It's very large and very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, delivery not so great!
customer_reviews.text: Great desk! Very sturdy and well built. Easy to assemble, and didn't take near as long as some other reviews have stated. From start to finish, it took about 90 minutes. Only negative was the delivery. The driver was incompetent, to say the least. The desk was packaged well, so no damage was done to the desk components.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Needed a workstation for my studio after shopping around and did some research decided to get this one. Pretty easy to put together and sturdy. The only complaint I have is the panels that hold up the desk should be thicker but it is solid. It came in 1 box which is heavy but I am def happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: E n D

customer_reviews.title: ... instead of rounded making for hard edges that are easily damaged. Hutch stand lacks pass through cable holes ...
customer_reviews.text: Edges are squared instead of rounded making for hard edges that are easily damaged. Hutch stand lacks pass through cable holes or mount points. Cabinet is kind of. Wast to small for any real gaming case. Think mid to micro tower. That space would be converted to filing cabnet or shelves. Otherwise it's pretty stable and assembled well (little trouble with keyboard). Keyboard is little to flush to desktop. It's hard to type on if slid in. My handed hit the mettle brackets (bad design, keybiard should not intersect join point).
customer_reviews.author: Griffon Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this desk. It is big... But love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Varino

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer Desk
customer_reviews.text: Met our expectations and was easy to set up with two people. We are satisfied with quality of this computer desk..
customer_reviews.author: L. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this desk. It is sturdy, and good looking for the price. However, You will need 2 people and 2 hours to fully assemble deck. Good directions, simple to put together. Just remember to try and assemble desk where you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Hill54

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, took some time to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great desk, took some time to put together, but it was fun. And all the pieces were there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as expected
customer_reviews.text: Back of table is partially unfinished and partially a birch colored wood. I understand this is a corner table, but i was at least expecting all one wood color and all finished so it can be moved and used as L-shape table in center of room. Color on top is also not sand, but has a 'lavenderish/pinkish' tint to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty stable and am still using it. Since 2011. Very appropriate for the type of home office/business I own. Will recommend it anytime. Great price also
customer_reviews.author: cynthia llloyd

customer_reviews.title: Nice Home Office Desk
customer_reviews.text: It took some time to put the desk together but it was fairly easy and it is a great desk for home office use!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bavery

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was very slow. I converted into a stand up desk by placing concrete blocks under each leg. Great work flow and desk space.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith E.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for water
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good desk. Good size, and as a taller person, I appreciate the raised area for monitors, that brings them more towards eye level. There's one big but - the veneer used on the desk surface is particularly susceptible to water. I've found just the sweat from a glass left for a few hours can cause it to wrap and wrinkle. Unlike a solid wood desk, you can't really buff or sand those marks out, so make sure you keep drinks away, or use coasters religiously.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gill

customer_reviews.title: Pungent oder (too much formaldehyde? ). Can't sit ...
customer_reviews.text: Pungent oder (too much formaldehyde?). Can't sit at desk for an extended amount of time without eyes burning. Tried applying a sealer to the wood and leaving the desk next to an open window for a week, still smells awful. Portions not visible in picture are not painted or sealed.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: It's too difficult to put all thsose thousands of pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: It's too difficult to put all thsose thousands of pieces together. Instructions are not cleared. Even after put the pieces together, you can not move the table as its not stable. But the table and pieces are too heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth getting
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, one of the best decisions i have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for WORK
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this desk to anybody looking for a sturdy desk that you're probably going to bang up. I know mine will because it'll be in a high traffic area. Assembly was cake and it was exactly what I was looking for. I like the platform in the corner which I will need for monitor speakers. This desk is perfect for my "wanna be recording studio". I would highly recommend it. love, peace, and titty grease.
customer_reviews.author: cynical villain

product_meta.title: Bestar Hampton Corner Workstation in Sand Granite & Charcoal

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars68 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
